p: Sixty‐four patients (phase 1, n = 14; phase 2, n = 50) were enrolled between 31 October 2011 and 12 December 2013. Patient demographics and baseline disease characteristics are summarized in Table 1: median age was 63·5 years (range 34–82), with 9% of patients aged ≥75 years; 52% had International Staging System (ISS) disease stage II or III; 81% had normal renal function or mild renal impairment (calculated creatinine clearance >60 ml/min); and 9% had high‐risk cytogenetic abnormalities.
